entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers with risk of a thunderstorm. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 15 April 2023
